svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 21, 2023" date: "2023-10-21"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
* Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
Devnet 9: testing found issue with conflicting blobs, to be clarified in the spec
Devnet 10: launch expected next week, waiting on KZG in clients (Go-KZG dependencies)
Latest all core devs â€“ consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
* Devnet 9: testing found issue with conflicting blobs, to be clarified in the spec
* Devnet 10: launch expected next week, waiting on KZG in clients (Go-KZG dependencies)
* Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.3 : mainnet KZG config and adds blob gossip condition
Consensus-specs v1.4.0-beta.3 : mainnet KZG config and adds blob gossip condition
* Dencun interop testing call video
Dencun interop testing call video
* Blob testing: Blobber : proxy between beacon & validator clients to modify blobs
Nethermind send blobs : tool to send valid/invalid blobs
Blob testing:
* Blobber : proxy between beacon & validator clients to modify blobs
Blobber : proxy between beacon & validator clients to modify blobs
* Nethermind send blobs : tool to send valid/invalid blobs
* KZG Ceremony: verify transcript & buy a POAP (~$0.25 for contributions that used
Sign-in with Ethereum, currently no POAP for GitHub contributors)
KZG Ceremony: verify transcript & buy a POAP (~$0.25 for contributions that used
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.74% has reduced again but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.74% has reduced again but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84%
supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any
client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
* Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Can/EU
For Stakers
* Validator entry & exit queues reached zero
Validator entry & exit queues reached zero
* Lighthouse trialing QUIC support for improved throughput & latency
Lighthouse trialing QUIC support for improved throughput & latency
Client releases
* Consensus layer: Lighthouse v4.5.444-exp : experimental tree-states to improve disk
usage & state management, not recommended for mainnet, supports Deneb on devnets Nimbus
v23.10.0 : performance improvements (mostly for large validator networks e.g. HoleÅ¡ky
testnet) Prysm v4.1.0 : Deneb foundations, reduced memory via multi-value slices,
EIP4881 (deposit tree) for improved block processing, BLST v0.3.11 for improved
portable build performance and multiarch containers preview
Consensus layer:
* Lighthouse v4.5.444-exp : experimental tree-states to improve disk usage & state
management, not recommended for mainnet, supports Deneb on devnets
Lighthouse v4.5.444-exp : experimental tree-states to improve disk usage & state
* Nimbus v23.10.0 : performance improvements (mostly for large validator networks e.g.
HoleÅ¡ky testnet)
Nimbus v23.10.0 : performance improvements (mostly for large validator networks e.g.
* Prysm v4.1.0 : Deneb foundations, reduced memory via multi-value slices, EIP4881
(deposit tree) for improved block processing, BLST v0.3.11 for improved portable build
performance and multiarch containers preview
Prysm v4.1.0 : Deneb foundations, reduced memory via multi-value slices, EIP4881
* Execution layer: Geth v1.13.4 : hotfix lowers warning log triggered by Erigon
Execution layer:
* Geth v1.13.4 : hotfix lowers warning log triggered by Erigon
Research
* Terence: forward inclusion-list with dedicated gas limits
Terence: forward inclusion-list with dedicated gas limits
* MEV-Burn simulated stats
MEV-Burn simulated stats
* Total-Order Broadcast protocol with single vote decisions in the Sleepy Model
Total-Order Broadcast protocol with single vote decisions in the Sleepy Model
Layer 2
* Scroll (zk rollup) mainnet live
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs Meta EIP7539 : ERC extensions (naming conventions, metadata & procedures)
EIP7541 : Apply coinbase rewards at the end of block
EIPs
* Meta EIP7539 : ERC extensions (naming conventions, metadata & procedures)
Meta EIP7539 : ERC extensions (naming conventions, metadata & procedures)
* EIP7541 : Apply coinbase rewards at the end of block
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7536 : Multi-edition NFT distribution ERC7537 :
Soulbound tokens ERC7538 : Multiplicative tokens ERC7540 : Asynchronous ERC4626
tokenized vaults
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7536 : Multi-edition NFT distribution
ERC7536 : Multi-edition NFT distribution
* ERC7537 : Soulbound tokens
ERC7537 : Soulbound tokens
* ERC7538 : Multiplicative tokens
ERC7538 : Multiplicative tokens
* ERC7540 : Asynchronous ERC4626 tokenized vaults
ERC7540 : Asynchronous ERC4626 tokenized vaults
Stuff for developers
* Reminder: Goerli testnet is deprecated, Base & Arbitrum are migrating testnets to
Sepolia
Reminder: Goerli testnet is deprecated, Base & Arbitrum are migrating testnets to
* Remix Cookbook plugin updated, one click code import
Remix Cookbook plugin updated, one click code import
* P256Verifier Vyper : contract for P256 signature verification rewritten in Vyper
P256Verifier Vyper : contract for P256 signature verification rewritten in Vyper
* Slither v0.10.0 : adds Vyper support, new detectors (incorrect-return, return-leave,
incorrect-exp, tautological-compare & return-bomb), new printers (ck, halstead &
martin) and improved Foundry support
Slither v0.10.0 : adds Vyper support, new detectors (incorrect-return, return-leave,
* Guide to multicall in dapps using wagmi
Guide to multicall in dapps using wagmi
* noble-ciphers v0.4 : AES in pure JavaScript, useful for platforms such as React
Native
noble-ciphers v0.4 : AES in pure JavaScript, useful for platforms such as React Native
* Personae Sapir : client-side zk proving library, experimental, based on Spartan
Personae Sapir : client-side zk proving library, experimental, based on Spartan
Security
* HopeLend protocol 528 ETH exploit via precision loss, attack was frontrun with assets
later returned
Ecosystem
* Hackathons: Ethereum Kuala Lumpur finalists Huffathon winners
* Ethereum Kuala Lumpur finalists
Ethereum Kuala Lumpur finalists
* Huffathon winners
Huffathon winners
Enterprise
* Reddit community points being sunset, due to scalability & regulatory environment
Reddit community points being sunset, due to scalability & regulatory environment
* Ferrari accepting ETH & USDC payments for cars in US
Ferrari accepting ETH & USDC payments for cars in US
Onchain stats
* Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 4.0 to 123.6 gwei, with 9.1 gwei average Zero net
issuance currently at 21.5 gwei 9.4k ETH net issuance this week
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 4.0 to 123.6 gwei, with 9.1 gwei average
* Zero net issuance currently at 21.5 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.5 gwei
* 9.4k ETH net issuance this week
9.4k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $1,546 - $1,627, currently $1,605
ETHUSD : $1,546 - $1,627, currently $1,605
* ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
ETHBTC : currently 0.054 (Flippening at ~0.16)
Notable at app layer
* PoolTogether v5 live on Optimism, permissionless, enter via deposit in app or swap,
prizes automatically sent
PoolTogether v5 live on Optimism, permissionless, enter via deposit in app or swap,
* Kain: Synthetix experiments , deploy to Base, Optimism & Arbitrum with non-SNX
collateral, deploy an optimized version of perps to mainnet and create a SNX chain
using OP Stack
Kain: Synthetix experiments , deploy to Base, Optimism & Arbitrum with non-SNX
* Yearn veYFI : ve-style tokenomics
Yearn veYFI : ve-style tokenomics
* Rysk finance atomic credit spreads ; [ Starbloom portfolio]
Rysk finance atomic credit spreads ; [ Starbloom portfolio]
* Uniswap Labs adds 0.15% fee for major token swaps via their UI, no fee for using
protocol
Uniswap Labs adds 0.15% fee for major token swaps via their UI, no fee for using
Job Listings
* Gnosis seek a VP Technology , Senior Web Devs (Wallet) & Backend Devs
Gnosis seek a VP Technology , Senior Web Devs (Wallet) & Backend Devs
* EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek a Technical Project Coordinator
EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek a Technical Project Coordinator
* Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
Senior Operations Security Expert wanted by EF
* eBay Web3 team seeking Lead Solidity Engineer
eBay Web3 team seeking Lead Solidity Engineer
* Aave seek a UX Engineer and a Staff Rust Engineer
Aave seek a UX Engineer and a Staff Rust Engineer
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit).Â Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
* FinCEN propose adding mixing to list of primary money laundering concerns
Chainalysis: role of crypto in terrorism financing vastly overestimated
FinCEN propose adding mixing to list of primary money laundering concerns
* Chainalysis: role of crypto in terrorism financing vastly overestimated
* NY Attorney General sues Gemini, Genesis & DCG for allegedly defrauding investors
NY Attorney General sues Gemini, Genesis & DCG for allegedly defrauding investors
* California Governor signed web3 licensing regime into law
California Governor signed web3 licensing regime into law
* European Central Bank: digital euro (CBDC) proceeding to 2 year preparation phase
European Central Bank: digital euro (CBDC) proceeding to 2 year preparation phase
* Australian Treasury crypto regulation consultation paper
Australian Treasury crypto regulation consultation paper
* Dozens of ConsenSys early employees sue Joe Lubin in US over alleged fraudulent
transfer of MetaMask & Infura
Dozens of ConsenSys early employees sue Joe Lubin in US over alleged fraudulent
General
* JP Kroning: lower estimate of Americans owning crypto
JP Kroning: lower estimate of Americans owning crypto
* Help find the hash-seeds for the NIST curves (P-192, P-224, P-256, P-384 & P-521)
Help find the hash-seeds for the NIST curves (P-192, P-224, P-256, P-384 & P-521)
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup
and @evan_van_ness to get most of the weekâ€™s news in real time.
Permalink for this weekâ€™s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-october-21-2023
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Oct 23 â€“ Optimismâ€™s RetroPGF Round 3 application deadline
Oct 23 â€“ Optimismâ€™s RetroPGF Round 3 application deadline
* Oct 22-24 â€“ ETH Hong Kong
Oct 22-24 â€“ ETH Hong Kong
* Oct 27-29 â€“ ETH London hackathon
Oct 27-29 â€“ ETH London hackathon
* Oct 27-29 â€“ ETH Miami festival & hackathon
Oct 27-29 â€“ ETH Miami festival & hackathon
* Oct 28-30 â€“ Paradigm CTF
Oct 28-30 â€“ Paradigm CTF
* Oct 31 â€“ Road to Devcon grants deadline (max $1k for local meetups)
Oct 31 â€“ Road to Devcon grants deadline (max $1k for local meetups)
* Nov 3-5 â€“ ETH Lisbon hackathon
Nov 3-5 â€“ ETH Lisbon hackathon
* Nov 13-19 â€“ Devconnect (Istanbul)
Nov 13-19 â€“ Devconnect (Istanbul)
* Nov 15-29 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 19
Nov 15-29 â€“ Gitcoin Grants 19
* Nov 16-19 â€“ Pragma & ETHGlobal Istanbul
